titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) dicyclopentenyloxyethyl methacrylate; (2) 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (4,5-dichloroocthilinone; (3) 3,5-dichloro-n-(1,1-dimethyl-z-propynl) benzamide (pronamide); (4) mixtures of 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (4,5-dichlorocthilinone with application adjuvants, with or without stabilizers; and (5) mixtures of 3,5-dichoro-n-(1,1-dimethyl-2-propynl) benzamide (pronamide) with application adjuvants.
